name: Ida´s Journey
description:
Year 2408 and the World got even more boring.

That is what Ida thinks after she is almost 85 years old and decides to leave the senior homes "Enclaves" to go for a big adventure.

This journey leads her to the old Homeworld Earth where all is just a big junkyard nowadays but still has people that are more or less excited to see a new face on the surface.

Controls:

Move: 

Left = A

Right = D

Jump = Space

Shoot = F
